Nrsc8ishi27CE9ibRXhZz47"]}},"version":1}

addAdminToPermissionList(address,address.details: This function can only be called by an existing foreign call admin.

params.foriegnCallAddress: The address of the foreign call contract.
params.policyAdminsToAdd: The address of the admin to add to the permission list.
params.selector: The function selector of the foreign call to add the admin to.

createForeignCall(uint256,(bool,address,.details: Builds a foreign call structure and maps it to the associated policy ID.

params._foreignCall: The definition of the foreign call to create.
params._policyId: The policy ID the foreign call will be mapped to.
params.foreignCallName: The name of the foreign call

returns._0: The index of the created foreign call.

params.foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to delete.
params.policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

getAllForeignCalls(uint256).details: Retrieve Foreign Call Set from storage

params.policyId: the policy Id of the foreign call to retrieve

returns._0: The PermissionedForeignCallStorage structure containing all permissioned foreign calls.

params.foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to retrieve.
params.policyId: The policy ID of the foreign call to retrieve.

params.foreignCallId: The identifier for the foreign call
params.policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

returns._0: the metadata for the foreign call

params.foriegnCallAddress: The address of the foreign call contract.
params.selector: The function selector of the foreign call to retrieve the permission list for.

returns._0: An array of addresses that are permissioned for the foreign call.

removeAllFromPermissionList(address,byte.details: This function can only be called by an existing foreign call admin.

params.foriegnCallAddress: The address of the foreign call contract.
params.selector: The function selector of the foreign call to remove all permissions from.

removeForeignCallPermissions(address,byt.details: This function can only be called by an existing foreign call admin.

params._foriegnCallAddress: The address of the foreign call contract.
params._selector: The function selector of the foreign call to remove permissions for.

removeFromPermissionList(address,bytes4,.details: This function can only be called by an existing foreign call admin.

params._foriegnCallAddress: The address of the foreign call contract.
params._selector: The function selector of the foreign call to remove the address from.
params.policyAdminToRemove: The address of the admin to remove from the permission list.

params.foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to update.
params.policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

updatePermissionList(address,bytes4,addr.details: This function can only be called by an existing foreign call admin.

params.foriegnCallAddress: The address of the foreign call contract.
params.policyAdminsToAdd: The addresses of the admins to add to the permission list.
params.selector: The function selector of the foreign call to update the permission list for.

addAdminToPermissionList(address,address.notice: Adds an admin to the permission list for a foreign call.

createForeignCall(uint256,(bool,address,.notice: Creates a foreign call and stores it in the contract's storage.

deleteForeignCall(uint256,uint256).notice: Deletes a foreign call from the contract's storage.

getForeignCall(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a foreign call from the contract's storage.

getForeignCallPermissionList(address,byt.notice: Retrieves the permission list for a foreign call.

removeAllFromPermissionList(address,byte.notice: Removes all addresses from the permission list for a foreign call.This function resets the permission list to only include the foreign call admin.

removeForeignCallPermissions(address,byt.notice: Removes foreign call permissions from the contract address and selector pair.

removeFromPermissionList(address,bytes4,.notice: Removes a specific address from the permission list for a foreign call.

updateForeignCall(uint256,uint256,(bool,.notice: Updates a foreign call in the contract's storage.

updatePermissionList(address,bytes4,addr.notice: Updates the permission list for a foreign call.
